sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthprogrmchangedtls ( progrm_file_nm , requst_no , rqester_id , change_requst_cn , requst_process_cn , opetr_id , process_sttus_code , process_de , rqestde , requst_sj ) VALUES ( #progrmFileNm# , #requstNo# , #rqesterId# , #changeRequstCn# , #requstProcessCn# , #opetrId# , #processSttusCode# , #processDe# , #rqestde# , #requstSj# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthprogrmchangedtls SET progrm_file_nm = #progrmFileNm# , requst_no = #requstNo# , rqester_id = #rqesterId# , change_requst_cn = #changeRequstCn# , requst_process_cn = #requstProcessCn# , opetr_id = #opetrId# , process_sttus_code = #processSttusCode# , process_de = #processDe# , rqestde = #rqestde# , requst_sj = #requstSj# WHERE 1 = 1 AND progrm_file_nm = #progrmFileNm# AND requst_no = #requstNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthprogrmchangedtls WHERE 1 = 1 AND progrm_file_nm = #progrmFileNm# AND requst_no = #requstNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT progrm_file_nm , requst_no , rqester_id , change_requst_cn , requst_process_cn , opetr_id , process_sttus_code , process_de , rqestde , requst_sj FROM COMTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE progrm_file_nm = #progrmFileNm# AND requst_no = #requstNo#

SELECT A.PROGRM_FILE_NM , A.REQUST_NO , A.RQESTER_ID , A.CHANGE_REQUST_CN , A.REQUST_PROCESS_CN , A.OPETR_ID , A.PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , A.PROCESS_DE , A.RQESTDE , A.REQUST_SJ FROM ( SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM , REQUST_NO , RQESTER_ID , CHANGE_REQUST_CN , REQUST_PROCESS_CN , OPETR_ID , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , PROCESS_DE , RQESTDE , REQUST_SJ , ROWNUM FROM COMTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE 1=1
PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword#
REQUST_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY PROGRM_FILE_NM DESC , REQUST_NO DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE 1=1
PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword#
REQUST_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
